attribute.value: select lbdh as key, lbmc as value from csb_jglb

sqlMap.select:
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select $qsrq$ qsrq,$jsrq$ jsrq,nf,lbmc,lbdh,jgdh,khdxdh,jgmc,yf,yyjg,zb from ( select t.nf, t.lbmc, t.lbdh, t.jgdh, t.khdxdh, t.jgmc, f_numtochar(cast(t.yf as integer)) || '月份' yf, t.yyjg, case when t.qh = 0 then 0 else round(cast(t.yyjg * 100 as decimal(19, 3)) / cast(t.qh as decimal(19, 3)), 2) end zb from ( select y.nf, y.lbmc, y.lbdh, y.jgdh, y.jgmc, y.khdxdh, y.yf, y.yyjg, sum(y.yyjg) over (partition by y.nf, y.yf) qh from ( select substr(f_numtochar(yyjg.tjrq), 1, 4) nf, csb.lbmc, jglb.lbdh, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, jg.khdxdh, substr(f_numtochar(yyjg.tjrq), 5, 2) yf, sum(yyjg.yyjg) yyjg from khfa_yyjg_hy yyjg inner join ( select distinct case when ym<$sysdate$ then ym else $sysdate$ end as ym from csb_sjw where ym = tjrq and tjrq between $qsrq1$ and $jsrq1$ ) sjw on sjw.ym = yyjg.tjrq inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = yyjg.khdxdh and $jsrq1$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join khdx_jglb jglb on jglb.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh and $jsrq1$ between jglb.qsrq and jglb.jsrq inner join csb_jglb csb on csb.lbdh = jglb.lbdh where exists(select 1 from khfa_fapz pz where yyjg.fabh=pz.fabh and pz.yyzlbh=1) group by substr(f_numtochar(yyjg.tjrq), 1, 4), substr(f_numtochar(yyjg.tjrq), 5, 2), csb.lbmc, jglb.lbdh, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, jg.khdxdh order by nf,yf,jglb.lbdh,jg.jgdh ) y ) t where 1=1 and t.lbdh='$jglb$' and t.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) union all
select t2.nf, t2.lbmc, t2.lbdh, t2.jgdh, t2.khdxdh, t2.jgmc, '月份合计' yf, sum(t2.yyjg) yyjg, case when sum(t2.qh)= 0 then 0 else round(cast(sum(t2.yyjg) * 100 as decimal(19, 3)) / cast(sum(t2.qh) as decimal(19, 3)), 2) end zb from ( select t.nf, t.lbmc, t.lbdh, t.jgdh, t.khdxdh, t.jgmc, f_numtochar(cast(t.yf as integer)) || '月份' yf, t.yyjg, t.qh, case when t.qh = 0 then 0 else round(cast(t.yyjg * 100 as decimal(19, 3)) / cast(t.qh as decimal(19, 3)), 2) end zb from ( select y.nf, y.lbmc, y.lbdh, y.jgdh, y.jgmc, y.khdxdh, y.yf, y.yyjg, sum(y.yyjg) over (partition by y.nf, y.yf) qh from ( select substr(f_numtochar(yyjg.tjrq), 1, 4) nf, csb.lbmc, jglb.lbdh, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, jg.khdxdh, substr(f_numtochar(yyjg.tjrq), 5, 2) yf, sum(yyjg.yyjg) yyjg from khfa_yyjg_hy yyjg inner join ( select distinct case when ym<$sysdate$ then ym else $sysdate$ end as ym from csb_sjw where ym = tjrq and tjrq between $qsrq1$ and $jsrq1$ ) sjw on sjw.ym = yyjg.tjrq inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = yyjg.khdxdh and $jsrq1$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join khdx_jglb jglb on jglb.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh and $jsrq1$ between jglb.qsrq and jglb.jsrq inner join csb_jglb csb on csb.lbdh = jglb.lbdh where exists(select 1 from khfa_fapz pz where yyjg.fabh=pz.fabh and pz.yyzlbh=1) group by substr(f_numtochar(yyjg.tjrq), 1, 4), substr(f_numtochar(yyjg.tjrq), 5, 2), csb.lbmc, jglb.lbdh, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, jg.khdxdh order by nf,yf,jglb.lbdh,jg.jgdh ) y ) t where 1=1 and t.lbdh='$jglb$' and t.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) )t2 group by t2.nf,t2.lbmc,t2.lbdh,t2.jgdh,t2.khdxdh,t2.jgmc ) m order by m.yf
